ygData.subject: Re: Re: lore items
ygData.msgSnippet: I have to agree with you here.  Waiting for 18 hours for a pair of journeyman s boots was one of my worst experiences in the game.  Especially when  after 15
ygData.messageBody:
I have to agree with you here. Waiting for 18 hours for a pair of
journeyman's boots was one of my worst experiences in the game. Especially
when after 15 hours it was my turn and I went linkdead and missed it. When
I managed to get back on, I was able to keep my place in line but I missed
the spawn and the number two person got them. It took me four more
agonizing hours before she finally had them again. My only consulation was
all the money I got for selling her ear rings later. After that, I feel it
would be much better if the item was on the MOB evertime unless they drop
different things like Najena does. In that case alternate each time. Rove
then Book. This would speed up te process and in my opinion make the game
more enjoyable for us all. Shoot I was so bored I had everyone in the room
floating....
